channel.title: Slight Screenshot Issue
channel.description: [font='Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif'][font='Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif']In an attempt to screenshot a small object, I noticed that the screenshot (F12) key does not work if the player crouches and holds "Z" at the same time. Also the liquid bars in the Health Stations preform a more choppy animation while they're being drained, unlike the mod version of the game that has the liquid animate smoothly. [/size][/font] [font='Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif']Anyone else having these issues?[/size][/font] [font='Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif'][/size][/font][/size][/font] [font='Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif']Overall, fantastic game. ovo[/size][/font][/size]

item.title: Slight Screenshot Issue
item.dc:creator: Sage_J_Fox
item.description:
I noticed the liquid being more choppy after the 0.1.0 content update. As for the screenshot issue, that’s present in a lot of games on Steam. Might be something to do with it not counting “ctrl (default crouch) + F12” as being a screenshot command. Even Valve’s games themselves had that issue for a while.

Read full topic

item.title: Slight Screenshot Issue
item.dc:creator: dm84doesgmod
item.description:
In an attempt to screenshot a small object, I noticed that the screenshot (F12) key does not work if the player crouches and holds “Z” at the same time.
Also the liquid bars in the Health Stations preform a more choppy animation while they’re being drained, unlike the mod version of the game that has the liquid animate smoothly.
[/size]
Anyone else having these issues?[/size]
[/size][/size]
Overall, fantastic game. ovo[/size][/size]

Read full topic
